  - `Utils.getTokenStrForm()` → `SecurityUtils.getTokenStrForm()`
  - `Utils.getUGI()` → `SecurityUtils.getUGI()`
  - `MetaStoreUtils.getMetaStoreSaslProperties(conf)` → `MetaStoreUtils.getMetaStoreSaslProperties(conf, false)`
- Removed `client.shutdown()` calls (method removed in Hive 3.x)
- Updated exception handling from `TException` to `Exception` in close() method
